Radar plots for tidal creek indicators

Source: R/show_tdlcrkradar.R
show_tdlcrkradar.Rd

Radar plots for tidal creek indicators

show_tdlcrkradar(id, cntdat)

Arguments

id

numeric indicating the id number of the tidal creek to plot
cntdat

output from anlz_tdlcrkindic

Value

A radar plot

Details

See details in anlz_tldcrkindic for an explanation of the indicators

Examples

cntdat <- anlz_tdlcrkindic(tidalcreeks, iwrraw, yr = 2018, rader = TRUE)

#> Error in anlz_tdlcrkindic(tidalcreeks, iwrraw, yr = 2018, rader = TRUE): unused argument (rader = TRUE)
show_tdlcrkradar(495, cntdat)

#> Error in dplyr::filter(., id == !!id): object 'cntdat' not found
